price: 39. Qofkii se toobad keena kaddib markuu gef galay ee hagaajiya (naftiisa), Alle wuu ka toobad aqbali. Hubaal Alle waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan.
arabic: فَمَن تَابَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ظُلۡمِهِۦ وَأَصۡلَحَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faman tāba min baʿdi ẓul'mihi wa-aṣlaḥa fa-inna al-laha yatūbu ʿalayhi inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
